sentences: Majesteet on üks põnevaimaid osisi filmis.
Ta üritas oma isegi mõjusat majesteeti nii, et me kõik naerda hakatasime.
context: In Estonian, 'majesteet' typically refers to a regal or noble bearing and dignity. It can also be used in the context of majesty as an attribute of a king or queen. In modern usage, it may carry a more humorous or theatrical connotation.
